description: The chilling story of an Irish immigrant cook who brought typhoid to well-to-do families in New York.
title: How Typhoid Mary left a trail of scandal and death
title_page: How Typhoid Mary left a trail of scandal and death - BBC News
maintext: The now familiar trail of death and sickness pursued her. It's impossible to know how many deaths she was responsible for. There were certainly at least three but more lurid accounts suggest there might be as many as 50.
